price: 16. Ama moominiin kay addal (jannat kinnuk) niqmootak faxxa haanam- lon umman kaal waarak, keenik Jannat culim ku-Rabbil cakkik yan xaganay kay naqoosak kaak meesita mari kaal esserita kinni.
arabic: لَّهُمۡ فِيهَا مَا يَشَآءُونَ خَٰلِدِينَۚ كَانَ عَلَىٰ رَبِّكَ وَعۡدٗا مَّسۡـُٔولٗا

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: lahum fīhā mā yashāūna khālidīna kāna ʿalā rabbika waʿdan masūlan
